restfulapi_submit: ${user} submitted a download from a RESTfulAPI for ${project}.
restfulapi_cancel: ${user} cancelled a download from a RESTfulAPI for ${project}.
restfulapi_upload_fail: ${user} requested a download from a RESTful API but an error occurred while processing a request for ${project}.
restfulapi_upload_success: ${user} successfully downloaded file(s) from a RESTful API for ${project}.
